basics.name: Sebastián García
basics.label: Software Developer
basics.summary: Programmer with +2 years of experience in application development. Specialized in Frontend, passionate about Open Source. I integrate into diverse work teams and seek to build strong relationships with my colleagues.
about: My full name is Johan Sebastian Castro Garcia. I am 20 years old, from Colombia, Cesar. I discovered programming when I was 17. Thank God, in the city where I moved, a programming academy opened. Thanks to the efforts of my mother and my friends, I had the opportunity to enter and began to learn the basics starting with HTML. It seemed like I had already studied this before, but it was not like that. I was good at it, I had just left school and did not know what to do, so I began to grow fond of it over time. Although the computer I had started with was a very old Dell Inspiron mini, it was difficult to even open the browser. However, after hard work I was able to buy my first laptop.

I got my first job a year and a half ago at a startup. I had to adapt to technologies I didn't know and I learned to grow alongside them by expanding my knowledge in the software development area. I had the opportunity to meet colleagues from all over the world and learn to work as a team and listen to my colleagues.

As hobbies, I usually research geography and astronomy, two areas that I enjoy researching. I am also a big music lover. In the sports area, I usually enjoy all sports, but currently I watch football more. As a programmer can't be without in his free time, he also likes to program. I usually work a lot on open source with my colleagues, innovating ideas and solutions, also contributing to existing projects.

work.name: DiensCO
summary: Current maintainer of domiplace.com and admin.efici.co
Migrated admin.efici.co from Vue 2 to Nuxt.js, improving performance by 100%
Led development of domiplace.com web app from mobile-only to full web presence

services: I can help you with advice and mentoring
You can contact me for a temporary service
I can help you boost your business with a website
I am open to job opportunities
